 THE POD BEGAN TO DIE OUT. SUDDENLY AND OVERRIDE SEQUENCE CAME ON. tHE BEAST 
TOOK SHAPE. hE BECAME A  pANTER. HE TOOH HIS NEW FORM AND LOCKED ONTO 
DRILLBIT'S SIGNATURE. "DRILLBIT IT IS DESTRUCTOR I HAVE RETURNED."
